      返回Continent的MapEditor.Model中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Continent ConquestMap.findContinent(java.lang.String name)
      Input a name of the continent, if valid, return the continent.
      Continent Territory.getCont()
      To get a continent where the territory is in.
      Continent Territory.getContinent()
      To get the continent that a territory is in.
      参数类型为Continent的MapEditor.Model中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void ConquestMap.addContinent(Continent cont)
      Add a qualified continent to the local variables.
      int ConquestMap.countTerritories(Continent cont)
      Count the number of current territories in target continent.
      void ConquestMap.deleteContinent(Continent cont)
      Delete the input continent, and remove the link between continent and its territories,set null continent to these territories.
      boolean ConquestMap.eachTerInContReachable(Continent continent)
      method to check if a territory is board to others in the target continent.
      java.util.HashSet<Territory> ConquestMap.getContinentTerritories(Continent cont)
      Return a unrepeated territory set of target continent.
      void Territory.setCont(Continent cont)
      setting the continent where the territory locates
      void Territory.setContinent(Continent cont)
      setting the continent where the territory locates
      void ConquestMap.setContinentName(Continent cont, java.lang.String name)
      input the Continent name, it can not be null, and change the map information
